titleStmt.title: The saints rest, and revvard in heaven Set forth in a sermon preached at the funerall of the most vertuous and truly religious gentlewoman, Mrs. Anne Tirwhytt, widdow of Robert Tirwhytt of Camringham in the county of Lincolne, Esq. Decemb. 8. 1652. By John Leigh, Master of Arts, and preacher of Gods word at Camringham near Lincolne.
titleStmt.author: Leigh, John, of Camringham, Lincolnshire.
